title: Devilry of Orthanc (5R49)
text:
Set:	Battle of Helm's Deep
Kind:	Shadow
Culture:	Isengard
Twilight:	2
Card Type:	Condition
Game Text:	Machine. Plays to your support area. Shadow: Exert an Uruk-Hai to place an [Isengard] token on this card. Maneuver: Spot 8 [Isengard] tokens to exert every character. Discard this condition.
Lore:	”'They have a blasting fire, and… they took the Wall.'”
Rarity:	R
